title: Definitely Not POPPY!!!!
body: haven't come up with any concept art yet but was thinking of poppy dressed as Annie wielding tibbers on a stick. just food for thought. was also thinking on an oce themed footrot flats skin for kindred :-)

replies.body:
The "Definitely Not" skins are traditionally just the champs with the fake mustache/glasses costume.

(see PBE as Definitely Not Vel'kox and "Definitely Not a Ward" was just added)

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GVbRocktF7s/Vt9AmB_MMhI/AAAAAAAA4l4/2-qs94PxYwU/s1600/wardImage_56.jpg
I want definitely not rengar as a skin, with him holding two branches with leaves

please do XD 
would be a interesting mix
